- Follow link below to CRAN  

[CRAN](http://cran.at.r-project.org/)  

![](cran_main.png)  

- Choose "Download R for Windows"  

![](base.png)  

- Choose "base"  

![](version.png)  

- Choose "Download R 3.3.1 for Windows"  

- Once downloaded, choose "run" to install
